data.title: FREE BAGS OF DIRT/MULCH
data.description: We have about 30 hefty bags of mixed top soil and mulch from our backyard that is free for the taking. Let me know when you want to stop by to pick it up. There's nothing wrong with it - our dog was eating the mulch otherwise we would have kept it.

data.title: Free carpet

U-haul 
In Portland, near Burlington.

data.title: Free Fill Dirt - You Haul - Drive right up to the pile
data.description:
Free Fill Dirt 
Good quality soil and some small rocks in it that will help it to pack well. 
You haul. Would like to have it gone this weekend. 
Drive right up to the pile. 3 min off I5 at the Bridgeport exit.
